channel.title: Dashboards on Vijay Waghmare
channel.description: Recent content in Dashboards on Vijay Waghmare

item.title: LasVegas: Tableau Dashboard
item.description: Objective: To create interactive dashboard for a client. Dataset: The ‘LasVegas’ dataset is a Multivariate dataset that provides details on 504 TripAdvisor reviews of the 21 hotels located in the Strip, Las Vegas. Audience: User of the dashboard created using Las Vegas dataset is Chris Brooks, manager at Wyndham Grand Desert (3-Star hotel) who is keen to perform SWOT analysis based on travelers’ feedback (review score). Chris would like to assess Wyndham’s strengths, weaknesses, opportunities, and threats with respect to other 3-Star hotels in the region (competitors).

item.title: Sales: PowerBI Dashboard
item.description: Objective: Interactive dashboard for auto spares/accessories sales data for period 2003 to 2005. Dataset: ClassicModels sample MySQL database from MySQL website. Observations: From Quarterly moving average, July to July seasonal cycle is evident. USA is most important regions w.r.t. Sales. USA, Spain, and France contributes 62.23% of the sales. Euro+Shopping Channel is the most important customer who orders products related to Classic Cars. Efforts should be made to reduce cancellation and dispute of orders to increase the sales.
